name: Sheltered (itch) (LucasJoestar, Guitoon, Julien Delaunay, Blast-SD)
description:
Play this cute little astronaut protecting his little planet from asteroids, and try to keep it alive!

Ludum Dare #46 submission, proudly made with Godot Engine fully coded with GDNative!

[Controls]

Keyboard left - right to move your character.

[Credits]

Julien DELAUNAY : Programmer / Artist
Lucas GUIBERT : Programmer
Matthieu RAUBER : Sound-Designer
Gaëtan VERGEOT : Programmer
